title.rendered: STEDI 7 INCH IRIS CHROME LED Headlight

content.rendered:
STEDI 7 inch IRIS LED Headlight Kit – ADR Approved. Fits a large variety of Jeep CJ, Wrangler, Land Rover Defender, Toyota Landcruiser 75 Series, Nissan GQ Patrol, Harley Davidson Motorcycles, Mercedes Benz G Wagon & Kenworth Truck Models.

SHARPER BEAM FURTHER LIGHT PENETRATION

ADR COMPLIANT

FINALLY A WORTHY 7″ LED HEADLAMP

You’ve either heard about or tried the other disaster 7″ LED kits on the market. Our IRIS LED Headlight unit is ADR Compliant and features a proper RHD beam geometry. Our IRIS is a complete LED unit that will replace your existing 7″ factory headlight unit. Complete with separate High & Low beams as well as a full halo DRL, the IRIS is your all in one upgrade solution for your motorbike or 4×4 vehicle that runs 7″ headlight (list of known compatible models in description).

PERFORMANCE THAT SURPASSES THE VERY BEST

The low beam is full of volume and throws out to 141m at 1 Lux. The high beam hrows out to 235m at the 1 Lux which is better than many auxiliary lights on the market. The integrated optional halo DRL can be wired to ignition or to a dedicated switch to illuminate to offer day-time safety. Anti-Flicker technology for an effortless install.

ADR COMPLIANT

The IRIS falls inside the parameters of ADR making it a 100% legal LED driving light upgrade. No wasting time checking whether or not your vehicle meets the guidelines for retro fitting LED lights, from the get go you’re all set.

DETAILS

Our IRIS 7 Inch LED Driving Lights should be the first step when improving your motorcycles’ light output. Complete with High and Low beam as well as a full LED halo ring DRL, the IRIS 7″  is the perfect replacement for your existing headlight.

KEY PERFORMANCE METRICS

  • ADR Approved E-Mark CE
  • Proper Right Hand Drive Beam Geometry
  • H4 Adaptor
  • High Beam 1 Lux @ 235m
  • Low Beam 1 Lux @ 141m

PERFORMANCE BUILD QUALITY

  • Anodized Polyester Powdercoat
  • Lexan Polycarbonate (PC) Lens refractor
  • Die-cast aluminium alloy (ADC12) Heat-Sink
  • IP67 | Ingress Protection
  • Shock Proof, Waterproof and UV Shielded
  • Protected against Reverse Polarity and Voltage / Current surges
  • Warranty | 2 Years

COMPATIBLE MODELS:

  • 1955-1983 Jeep CJ-5
  • 1976-1986 Jeep CJ-7
  • 1981-1985 Jeep CJ-8
  • 1997-2006 Jeep Wrangler (TJ)
  • 1982 – 1991 Mitsubishi Pajero (L040)
  • Land Rover Defender
  • 70 Series Toyota Landcruiser with round headlamp (Needs additional H4 CANBUS to resolve negative switching)
  • 60 Series Toyota Landcruiser with round headlamp (Needs additional H4 CANBUS to resolve negative switching)
  • Toyota FJ-40/45/47 (Needs additional H4 CANBUS to resolve negative switching)
  • GQ Patrol
  • Harley Davidson Motorcycles
  • Mercedes Benz G Wagon
  • Kenworth Trucks with 7 inch round headlight

SPECIFICATIONS

LED High Beam: 2x 10w XML-2 LED
Low Beam: 2x 15w LED
DRL: 30x 1.5w Osram
RAW LUMENS High Beam: 2000Lm
Low Beam: 1400Lm
DRL: 150Lm
AMP DRAW  High Beam: 2.4a @ 13.6v
Low Beam: 1.6a @ 13.6v
DRL: 0.2a @ 13.6v
LIFESPAN  50,000 Hours
INGRESS PROTECTION IP67
OPERATING TEMPERATURE -30°C~+60°C
LENS MATERIAL LEXAN Polycarbonate
COLOUR TEMP 5700K
VOLTAGE COMPATIBILITY  12v & 24v
PEAK BEAM DISTANCE @ 1 LUX High Beam: 235m
Low Beam: 141m
DRL: 8m
WEIGHT (EACH) 1.140kg each
DROP IIN REPLACEMENT FOR  #6014, 6015, 6016, H6024 and Par 56 headlamp designs

 

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • 1 x 7 inch STEDI IRIS LED Headlight

excerpt.rendered:
STEDI 7 INCH IRIS LED HEADLIGHT

Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
